item.description:
Gong Meditation is restorative for all.

Please share this event with your friends, family & acquaintances.  I love sharing this amazing healing sound with you to help raise your vibration, raise the vibration of our communities and the world.

We will begin with a brief warm up to help create  a deep meditation and then lie back to receive the deep resonating sounds of the gongs. An effective way to gather the monkey mind and simply settle down to enjoy  a healing, the stillness and slip away into sweet nothingness.

Excellent for all physical levels.

All a listener needs to do is relax and let the sound bathe the body and carry the mind into deep meditation.

The sound of the gong can be used to rebalance and tone the physical, emotional and spiritual bodies. It is an excellent therapy for stress related issues, depression, fatigue, anger and hostility, feelings of fear, separation and loneliness, along with many other conditions related to the lack of balance and harmony in the body.

Call Darnell with any questions at 857-526-2200
item.name: Divine Healing Gong Meditation with Darnell
